pages.text: The $(item)Speed Rune$() increases all of the crafting operations of the Blood Altar. The crafting speed (and speed that the progress is lost when empty) increases by an additive +20% per rune.

With some $(item)Netherite Scrap$() and some $(item)Intricate Hellforged Parts$() looted from the $(l:bloodmagic:dungeons/endless_realm)Demon Realm$(), you can double the power of your $(item)Speed Rune$(), increasing the crafting rate by an additive +40% per rune.
If you change your mind, you can undo the recipe in the ARC.
